Argilians, a colony of Andrians,*' 397- Argives, have thirty years truces with the Laced monians, II. 13. are irritated by the Corin- thians against the Laced mo- nians, 25. aim at being a lea- ding state, 26. make war upon the Epidaurians, 51. are sur- rounded by the Laced monians, but let go, 56. are defeated at Mantinea, and make peace, 67,71.
